cookiePolicylastUpdated: THIS POLICY WAS LAST UPDATED ON 14/12/2021.
cookiePolicyintro: When you visit or interact with our Sites, we or our authorized service providers may use cookies, web beacons and other similar technologies to store information that will allow us to provide you with a better, faster and more secure experience, as well as for advertising purposes.
cookiePolicykeyPoints: This page is designed to help you better understand these technologies and how we use them on our sites. Below you will find a summary of some key points to know about our use of these technologies.
cookiePolicycookiesDefinition: Like most sites, we use technologies that are small data files placed on your computer, tablet, mobile phone or other device (collectively devices) that allow us to record a certain amount of information when you visit or interact with our sites, services, applications, messaging and tools.
cookiePolicysessionCookies: The specific types and names of cookies, beacons and other similar technologies we use may change at any time. To better understand this Policy and our use of such technologies, we provide the following limited definitions and terminology:
cookiePolicysessionCookiesType2: small text files (usually consisting of letters and numbers) placed in your browser or device's memory when you visit a website or view a message. Cookies allow a website to recognize a specific device or browser.
cookiePolicysessionCookiesType3: There are different types of cookies:
cookiePolicySessionCookiesTypeSession2: expire at the end of your browsing session and allow us to associate your actions during this session.
cookiePolicypersistentCookies2: are stored on your device between browser sessions, allowing us to remember your preferences or actions across sites.
cookiePolicyInternalCookies2: are defined by the site you are visiting.
cookiePolicyThirdPartyCookies2: are defined by a third party site, different from the site you are visiting.
cookiePolicyDisableCookies: Cookies can be disabled or deleted by tools available on most commercial browsers. The preferences for each browser you use will need to be set separately because each browser offers different features and options.
cookiePolicyWebBeacons: small graphic images (also known as “web beacons” or “clear GIFs”) that may be added to our sites, services, applications, messaging and tools. They are generally used with cookies to identify our users and their behavior.
cookiePolicyOtherTechnologies2: technologies that store information in your browser or device using local shared objects or local storage, such as cookies or Flash or HTML 5 cookies and other web application software. These technologies may work across all of your browsers. In some cases, they may not be fully supported by browsers and may require management directly through your device or installed applications. We do not use these technologies to store information to target advertisements to you on or off our sites.
cookiePolicyTerminology: We may use the terms cookies or similar technologies interchangeably in our policies to refer to any technologies that we may use to store data in your browser or device, collect information or help us to identify you in the manner described above.
cookiePolicyCookiesUsed: The cookies used on this website
cookiePolicyCookiesUsed2: can be grouped into three categories described below.
cookiePolicyPerformanceCookies2: These cookies allow us to count the number of visits and identify traffic sources in order to measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us identify which pages are most popular and which are least popular and allow us to see how visitors navigate the site. All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not know when you have visited our site and we will not be able to monitor its performance.
cookiePolicyStats: In the table below you will find a list of statistical cookies used on this website.
cookiePolicyAboutPolicy: We may modify the Cookie Policy from time to time, in whole or in part, at our discretion. The latest version of this document will always be available on our website and will take effect on the date it is updated.We may modify the Cookie Policy from time to time, in whole or in part, at our discretion. The latest version of this document will always be available on our website and will take effect on the date it is updated.
cookiePolicyUpdatePreferences: You can customize your choices regarding cookies (except necessary cookies) by clicking the 'Cookie Settings' button below:
errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request.
errorDevelopmentModeDescription: Swapping to the Development environment displays detailed information about the error that occurred.
errorDevelopmentModeWarning: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications. It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users. For local debugging, enable the Development environment by setting the ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT environment variable to Development and restarting the app.
homeWelcomeText: Discover the original concept of Maison Eau d'Or located at 123 Avenue René Coté in Le Havre
homeOfferingText: We offer unique collections of perfumes and interior sprays

paymentPageRules: By continuing you accept the general conditions
paymentPageAcceptRules: I accept the processing of my data by Maison d'eau D'or for marketing purposes
privacyPolicySubtitle: Protecting your privacy is paramount to Maison Eau D'Or.
privacyPolicyContent: We ensure the protection of your privacy during your visits to our website or when placing orders online.
privacyPolicyContent2: Maison Eau D'Or provides products and services and acts as the data controller for the personal data you provide when placing an order. You can contact Maison Eau D'Or's Data Protection Officer using the contact form at the bottom of this page.
privacyPolicyContent3: This privacy policy defines how personal data about you is collected, processed, and shared when you visit the site or order from maisoneaudor.sumup.link (the 'Website').
privacyPolicyTitle: What personal data do we collect?
privacyPolicyContentData: When you make or attempt to make a purchase through the Website, we collect certain information about you, including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment information (including credit card numbers), your email address and phone number. This information is called “Order Information”.
privacyPolicyContentData2: When you visit the Website, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including data about your internet browser, IP address, time zone; some cookies are installed on your device. Additionally, when you browse the Website, we collect information about the specific pages or products you view, the sites or search terms that referred you to the Website, and data about how you interact with the Website. This data collected automatically is referred to as “Device Information”.
privacyPolicyContentData3: We collect device information using the following technologies: - “Cookies” are data files that are placed on your device or computer; they usually contain an anonymous unique identifier. For more information about cookies and how to disable them, visit http://www.allaboutcookies.org. - “Log files” track activities on the Website and collect data, including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages and date/time stamps. - “Beacons”, “tags” or “pixels” are electronic files used to record information about how you browse the Website.
privacyPolicyTitleDataPerso: How do we process personal data about you?
privacyPolicyContentDataPerso: Order Information is generally processed in order to fulfill orders placed on the Website (including to process your payment information, manage shipping arrangements and issue invoices and/or order confirmation ). In addition, this Information relating to the order is processed in order to: - communicate with you; - monitor orders in order to detect possible risks or fraud and - send you informative or advertising communications concerning our products and services if these communications comply with the preferences that you have shared with us.
privacyPolicyContentDataPerso2: Data concerning you is processed in order to fulfill our contractual obligations towards you (for example in the event of an order on our Website), or to otherwise defend our legitimate commercial interests as listed above.
privacyPolicyContentDataPerso3: Information relating to the device (in particular your IP address) is collected in order to detect possible risks and fraud, and more generally in order to improve and optimize the Website.
privacyPolicytitleShareData: Sharing of personal data about you
privacyPolicyContentShareData: We share personal data about you with third parties to process them in accordance with the conditions defined above. For example, we use SumUp to enhance our online store. We also use Google Analytics to understand how our customers use the site - to learn more about how Google uses personal data about you, visit the following page: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/. You can disable Google Analytics by clicking the following link: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout. We may share data as part of contracts with service providers who contribute to some of our activities. These contracts stipulate that such providers are entitled to process data about you only for the purposes of the services they perform on our behalf and are prohibited from using it for their own benefit. Similarly, we may disclose personal data about you to comply with a legal or regulatory requirement, a subpoena, a search warrant, and/or any other legitimate information request we receive or to otherwise protect our rights.
privacyPolicyContentTransfertData: We may transfer data collected about you to third parties acting on our behalf located in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA) or in countries deemed by the European Commission to provide a satisfactory level of data protection. It's possible that these other countries may not offer the same level of protection for data collected about you.
privacyPolicyContentText: We ensure the protection of your privacy during your visits to our website or when placing orders online. Maison Eau D'or provides products and services and acts as the controller for the personal data you provide when placing an order. You can contact Maison Eau D'or's Data Protection Officer using the contact form at the bottom of this page. This privacy policy outlines how personal data about you is collected, processed, and shared when you visit the site or place an order on maisoneaudor.sumup.link (the 'Website').
privacyPolicyAccessRightsContent: If you are subject to GDPR, you have the right to access the personal data we hold about you and the right to rectify, update, and erase this data. You also have the right to request the cessation of processing your data, to object to profiling and automated processing of your data. Additionally, you have the right to restrict processing and transfer your data (right to data portability) in certain circumstances. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details below.
privacyPolicyWithdrawConsentContent: You have the right at any time to withdraw your consent to the processing of your data for which the legal basis is your consent, by contacting the Data Protection Officer (DPO) at the provided address.
privacyPolicyContactUsContent1: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact form below.
privacyPolicyComplaintRightsContent: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority. The list of the competent authority for each country is available on the European Commission website: http://ec.europa.eu/newsroom/article29/item-detail.cfm?item_id=612080
privacyPolicyDataRetentionContent: When you place an order through the website, we will retain the order-related information for as long as necessary to perform our services or as long as required by applicable laws. At the end of this period, your personal data will be erased.
privacyPolicyModificationsContent: We reserve the right to make occasional changes to this Privacy Policy, for example, to reflect changes in our practices or for any other operational, legal, or regulatory reason.
privacyPolicyContactUsContent2: For more information about our privacy practices, for any questions or complaints, please contact us using the contact form below.

termsConditionsPageTitle: Maison Eau D'or - Terms and Conditions
termsConditionsPageTitleIntro: Please find below our terms and conditions regarding the use of the website maisoneaudor.sumup.link and the purchase of products on this site.
termsConditionsPageTitleContactInfo: Feel free to contact us with any questions regarding these conditions using the contact form below.
termsConditionsPageTitleSiteUsage: Customer use of the website is governed by these terms and conditions as well as any notices or conditions on any other part of the website...
termsConditionsPageTitleContractEffect: The contract will only take effect between you (as the customer) and us once the order has been processed and shipped.
termsConditionsPageTitleOrderGuarantee: By placing an order, you accept these terms and conditions and acknowledge having read them before proceeding with the order.
termsConditionsPageTitleCancelOrder: As a customer, you can cancel an order within 14 days and will be refunded the amount of the order to the account with which you paid your order.
termsConditionsPageTitleAcceptOrder: When an order is placed, you will receive an order confirmation at the email address provided during payment, containing information about the content and price of the order.
termsConditionsPageTitleDeliveryOptions: As a buyer, you can choose from the mentioned delivery options and the time that suits you best. Maison Eau D'or cannot be held responsible for any damage caused during transport or due to any delay beyond its control...
termsConditionsPageTitleReturnPolicy: Maison Eau D'or accepts returns within 14 days if the items have not been used, modified, washed, or otherwise handled. Items must be returned in their original packaging. Items cannot be returned to Maison Eau D'or without the prior written consent of Maison Eau D'or and are subject to return fees.
termsConditionsPageTitleLiability: We strive to maintain the information on this website as accurate as possible; however, we make no warranties in this regard, whether express or implied...
termsConditionsPageTitleSeverability: Any provision of these terms and conditions that is deemed void, illegal, or unenforceable for any reason will be deemed severed from the rest of the terms and conditions, which will remain valid and enforceable.
termsConditionsMinor: - that he is not a minor or legally incapable of entering into a contract.
termsConditionsCoord: - that the contact details disclosed during registration are complete and accurate.
termsConditionsFalseIdentity: - that he does not use a false name or that of another natural or legal person without authorization.

aboutText: We are warmly welcomed at the Ydentik boutique located at 123 Avenue René Coté in Le Havre.
aboutText2: Their concept is to create unique and personalized perfumes. I find the idea brilliant. The decor is chic and clean in white colors, perfume bottles fill one side of the wall like in bars, and on the other side, we discover the scents of the blends. Most often, we know well that in a perfume, it's the brand and packaging that we pay for, but here, that's no longer the case. The team is welcoming and attentive. It's up to you to compose your perfume with their advice. Once you've chosen your ingredients, they prepare your unique perfume cocktail.
